mapper.select: SELECT user_info.uid, user_info.`name`, user_info.`password`, user_info.salt, user_info.state, user_info.username, sys_role.id, sys_role.available, sys_role.description, sys_role.role FROM user_info RIGHT JOIN sys_user_role ON user_info.uid = sys_user_role.uid LEFT JOIN sys_role ON sys_user_role.role_id = sys_role.id WHERE username=#{username}
